EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Webinar_Google_Wallet_Fanatics_Q214.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See You in 1 Hour: Google Wallet - The Fanatics Experience Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We're sending you a friendly reminder of your registration for our upcoming webinar "Google Wallet - The Fanatics Experience" on Friday, May 9, 2014 at 10:00 AM PDT/1:00PM EDT. We look forward to you joining us. Please see the event details below:
Date: Friday, May 9, 2014 Time: 10:00 AM PDT (San Francisco)//1:00PM EDT (New York) Event Number: 667 301 812
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667301812> <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667301812> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=112132122&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 667 301 812
{{my.Save the Date:default=}}
Thank you, The Pivotal Labs Team
